allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: StanVibe - AI 아이돌 채팅 웹앱

- Vite + React 19 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS v4
- 3 built-in idols: 장원영\(IVE\), 민규\(SVT\), 김채연\(tripleS\)
- 6-category knowledge system per idol \(personality, background, speech-patterns, topics, boundaries, relationships\)
- Group info system \(IVE, SEVENTEEN, tripleS\) with overview, members, discography
- Admin panel with CRUD, knowledge editor, test chat, import/export
- Express proxy server + Vercel serverless functions
- IndexedDB hybrid storage with static file fallback
- SSE streaming chat with Claude Opus 4.6

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash("/c/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" repo create stanvibe --private --source=. --push --remote=origin)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Vercel chat API + admin password protection

- Replace Anthropic SDK with direct fetch in serverless function \(fix Connection error\)
- Add password gate to /admin \(password: admin, session-based\)
- Remove admin link from idol selector UI
- Fix deprecated apple-mobile-web-app-capable meta tag

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
